title: Purple ward Bug
body: Whenever i play a league game my normal ward skin{{item:2044}} it appears as my gentleman poro ward. but when i place a purple ward{{item:2043}} My Ward skin suddenly changes to the astronaut poro which im not sure if that was intended or if its just my game being broken.

replies.body: This is a known issue and we're working on a fix! Thanks for the report!
i have the underworld poro ward skin. i just placed a vision ward last game and it came up as a dragonslayer poro ward(which isnt even out yet)
